name: Goliath
description:
A military AC130 Gunship simulation with incredible graphics, sound and action!

"GOLIATH Actual, be advised... We need immediate close air support! Friendly ground forces have multiple enemy hostiles moving in hard & fast on their position, over."

Take command of GOLIATH, an infamous AC 130 Spectre Gunship, also known as the "Angel of Death."

Be advised... the enemy forces will throw everything they have at you to win the battle. Our only hope of bringing the friendly ground team back home alive is you and your air crew. Use your arsenal of heavy explosive ordnance and support units to hold off waves of enemy attacks.

name: The Loveland Frog
description:
A Myth, or A Legend?

Once a media cycle, the Loveland Frog cryptid makes their appearance to a select few. Though they may be three feet tall, an unusual size for a frog, they are truly a friendly character. However, people find the Frog menacing, and do not understand them. They run away from the Frog, and occasionally attempt to attack them in misguided fear...

It has been three years since the Loveland Frog was last seen, and tonight they have decided to shake things up. They wish to go for a stroll across a busy highway, where many people will be able to see that they really exist. However, due to their isolation from human culture, they do not understand "vehicles", and so do not know the danger they represent...

name: Magnum 3.0
description:
Super realistic Gun simulator app. Many exciting guns in the world. Let's enjoy!

"Magnum3.0 Gun Custom Simulator" is the gun app for simulating guns all over the world.
You can simulate the parts of the gun and make your gun realistic applying "Sublogic v3.0 Gun Sim Engine".
You can enjoy realistic sounds and motions of your guns and you may feel like you are treating a real gun.

name: Rise of Eros: Desire
description: "Rise of Eros: Desire" is a AAA mobile game crafted with a realistic 3D style, featuring 360-degree real-time visuals that showcase the characters' finely detailed facial features and every inch of their skin. The game is designed with top-tier standards in visuals and sound effects, while also offering deep strategic gameplay and character development mechanics, providing players with a thrilling fantasy adventure.

name: Office 29
description: In Office 29, a seemingly normal workday turns into a nightmarish journey through a haunted office. You wake up at night, alone, and must gather your belongings while navigating terrifying anomalies that distort reality. As you explore, strange events unfold—lights flicker, shadows move, and eerie figures lurk outside the window. Each anomaly hides secrets, pushing you deeper into the unknown.

name: Among Us VR: Limited Time Pack: Round Up
description: Yeehaw, y’all! Time to spruce up the Wardrobe with three new cosmetics. The Limited Time Pack: Round Up bundle includes: Ten Gallons (Hat), Mustachioed (Hat) , Howdy Duty (Skin)

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Holiday Hideaway
description: Tucked away in a log cabin near the North Pole lies a cozy winter hideaway where you can celebrate the holidays with friends and family, or escape from them into quiet solitude! Warm your whiskers as you frolic through the seasonal decorations, presents, and Christmas charm of this twinkly and nostalgic mini golf adventure that is sure to be on your list.

name: Stay: Forever Home
description: A magical friend - who won't dig holes in your backyard. Ember's not your average pet! She weaves delight into your life and invites you to share her extraordinary world.

name: Cues
description:
Dive into Cues, a hand-tracking experience where music meets motion.
Wield bouncing light orbs to shatter "cues" and unravel puzzles, all while crafting a dynamically evolving symphony influenced by your every move. Enjoy a relaxed, soothing game that constantly evolves, offering new challenges and surprises.
Ideal for brief, engaging sessions, 'Cues' converts any room into a vibrant arena of musical puzzles.

name: Super-Spatial
description: Explore, build, and master the art of automation. Build your base, discover colorful new worlds, and develop new technologies as you tame the far reaches of space and search for a way to return to Earth.

name: Payuta and the Ice God
description: Payuta and the Ice God is an educational interactive game for children set in the Arctic. Players take on the role of Payuta, a young Inuit boy who must challenge Kiagnyk, the ice god, to rescue his kidnapped sister Opiak. Throughout the adventure, children engage with puzzles, memory challenges, and skill-based minigames that teach them about Inuit culture, traditions, and daily life in the Arctic. The game blends entertainment with learning, offering insights into Inuit lore and lifestyle while guiding players through Payuta's quest to save his sister from the threatening ice god.

name: Enscroll
description: Fresh out of Magic Academy with a hefty student loan, you must craft and sell magic scrolls to pay off your debt. Create spells for demanding customers and manage your growing loan payments. Will your magical skills be enough to free you from student debt?

name: Bone to Gather
description: "Bone To Gather" is a synergy-building action roguelike. Embark on an epic journey with a team of puny skeletons determined to revenge the Demon King. Recruit skeletons with unique synergies to create a powerful team and battle through monsters on your way to the final showdown.

name: Dr. Cog
description: Dr. Cog is a deck-building roguelike game using gears. Operate the memory restoration machine, turn gears, discover and enhance them, and build synergies. Complete the memory restoration within the time limit, recover the client's lost memories, and reach the final chapter.

name: Balantica
description: Safely guide the twins to the altar. The path to the altar branches into multiple routes, each filled with trials and unexpected events awaiting the twins. As their companion, you will choose their path, build a deck of cards to give hope and overcome increasingly challenging trials.

name: Killistar
description: Killistar: A 2D/3D sci-fi shoot-em-up remake of the classic arcade game Sinistar.

name: InKing
description: Inking is a fast-paced 2D top-down action game. Players take on the role of an ink bottle warrior on a journey to become the king of tools. Use your fast attacks, moves, and powerful skills to defeat the tools that stand in your way, prove that ink and pen are the best tools, and become the King of Tools.

name: The Mysterious Thief: Forget Me Not
description: A story-rich, girl's love visual novel about phantom thieves.

name: Dicey Tales
description: Roll the dice in your hand! Dicey Tales, a TRPG-inspired game, combines deckbuilding with strategy in a unique SRPG experience. Assemble the ultimate expedition team with a variety of heroes. Defeat powerful bosses through strategic decisions and a bit of luck!

name: Opus Cortex
description: Sin descripción

name: Darby is Here Forever
description: Sin descripción

name: Masks of the Void
description: Masks of the Void is a Rogue-lite action-RPG where you use powerful masks that grant you unique powers. Player's can level up their skills and swap them out for better ones as their journey continues.

name: Kokeshi: The Secret of the Cicada's Nest
description: Sin descripción

name: The Wide Open Sky Is Running Out of Catfish
description: A story-driven photography game... on the back of a giant, flying catfish. Transform clouds into sea creatures and bring abundance back to an empty sky.

name: Vaultframe
description: A sci-fi, zero-gravity side-scroller. Navigate a labyrinth of parasite-spore-infected energy cells on a space station, fighting parasites and evading deadly traps. Complete your mission and reach the only escape before the station’s purge wipes out everything alive.

name: Aggrolotls
description: A top-down arena roguelike where you play as tiny axolotls and must evolve into a swarm that can take on powerful creatures from the sea. Level up and choose from upgrades that make each round feel unique.

name: Pachinko TD
description: Pachinko TD is a physics-based, minimalist tower defense game. Inspired by Thronefall.

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Raven One Сampaign by Baltic Dragon
description: The Raven One campaign for the F/A-18C Hornet is based on the bestselling novel of the same title. This campaign was developed with the active participation of author Kevin Miller and Vincent "Jell-O" Aiello, host of the Fighter Pilot Podcast. Both are retired U.S. Navy Hornet pilots, each with over 3,000 career flight hours and numerous overseas deployments.

name: Svekmas: The Game
description:
Svekmas: The Game

Get ready for a hilarious holiday adventure in Svekmas: The Game! This lighthearted and satirical game was created as a tribute to Svekmas, the annual Christmas event hosted by DikkeSvekke.

Take control of Santa’s sleigh and his trusty reindeer in a fast-paced, fun-filled challenge. With simple controls (spacebar or right mouse click), navigate your way through an endless winter wonderland. Dodge Christmas trees, stay alive as long as possible, and climb the community leaderboard to prove you’re the ultimate sleigh master!

Will you survive the chaotic festivities and reign supreme this Svekmas season?

name: Sokomonster
description: Unleash chaos, strategize destruction, and conquer the city - monster style!

name: Zigzag Car
description: Sin descripción

name: Toy Titan: Protector of Childhood Dreams
description: In a faraway realm, the benevolent Eldritch Crafters have entrusted you with a powerful artifact: the Dreamcore. This enchanted relic safeguards the vibrant fantasies and imaginations of children across the globe. However, the world is threatened by the malevolent sorcerer, Nythros, who desires to shatter the Dreamcore and plunge everything into a bleak, dreamless void.

name: Dead By Daylight: Doomed Course
description:
CHAPTER 34: Doomed Course is the thirty-fourth Chapter DLC for Dead by Daylight.
This DLC features the following content: 1 Original Survivor: Taurie Cain, 1 Original Killer: The Houndmaster. The Chapter will release without an accompanying new Map.

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Raven One: Dominant Fury Campaign by Baltic Dragon
description: Raven One: Dominant Fury campaign for the F/A-18C Hornet is a prequel for the highly acclaimed Raven One campaign, based on the bestselling novel of the same title. Developed by Baltic Dragon, all the missions were constructed with the active participation of author of the book, Kevin Miller, and Vincent "Jell-O" Aiello, host of the Fighter Pilot Podcast - both retired U.S. Navy Hornet pilots, each with over 3,000 career flight hours and numerous overseas deployments.

name: Made In MFGG
description: A WarioWare fangame focusing on the use of the mouse and keyboard.

name: Save The Doge 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Vaulting Champions
description: Try this incredible mix of track and field and running. Pole vaulting through the course is something very unusual and unrealistically fun!

name: RAF Survival: Ocean Shark Survivor
description: Set sail into the unknown in RAF Survival - Ocean Shark Survivor, where every wave could spell adventure or doom! Stranded on a precarious makeshift raft, your journey begins in the vast, shimmering expanse of the ocean. With nothing but your wits and determination, transform your humble vessel into a floating sanctuary of survival!

name: OFC: Ultimate Fighting Club
description: OFC - ULTIMATE FIGHTING CLUB invites you to dive into the brutal world of no-holds-barred fighting, where the only rule is to win. Join a fighting club inspired by the intense atmosphere of real OFC tournaments, and level up your fighter to become a true champion.

name: Learn to Play Vol. 9: Santa's Sleigh Ride
description:
You are Santa Clause and it's your task to deliver all the Christmas presents, just in time for the holidays.
Hop on your sleigh, fly over a bustling town, decide who's been good or bad and deliver lots of wonderful presents to all the happy townsfolk.
Watch out for obstacles in the sky! Can you make it in time for Christmas?

name: Infernitos
description: In Infernitos, take on the role of a little imp chef serving up devilishly delightful dishes to hungry demon patrons. Move the dishes across the fiery kitchen, carefully pushing and delivering them on the table to serve your hellish clients. Every level demands sharp thinking and a strategic approach, as each dish must be assembled with precision to satisfy your picky infernal clientele!

name: Learn to Play Vol. 10: Gravity Space Walk
description: Repair your spaceship and return home!

name: Unhidden: Cozy Hidden Object
description: Immerse Yourself in Tranquil Scenes: Explore beautifully crafted locations—from quaint cottages to peaceful gardens—each brought to life with intricate details, enchanting animations, and soothing soundscapes.

name: Color Swiper 2
description: From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the sequel to the popular puzzle game "Color Swiper". In this expansion you can expect new, hand-crafted, tricky levels in which the aim is to fill all the squares with skillful swiping movements!

name: Christmas Gift Catcher
description: From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the perfect game for the holidays: "Christmas Gift Catcher"! After decorating the Christmas tree in our previous game, "Christmas Tree Decorating Simulator", now it's time to collect the presents.

name: Truck Simulator 25: American Driver
description: Truck Simulator 25 - American Driver invites you to an exciting adventure on the roads of America, progressing through levels set in diverse locations — from industrial zones to quiet suburbs and the bustling city center. From hauling cargo across diverse landscapes to managing your trucking business, this game brings the thrill of the road to life. Your task is to deliver goods on time, improving your driving skills and upgrading your trucks as you go.

name: Mac & Jack: Candy Bashers
description:
Mac & Jack: Candy Bashers is a hi-score chasing roguelite following the adventures of a Pumpkin and their loyal friend.

Brave the Halloween night and work to survive against waves of monsters while collecting as much candy as you can! Discover new items by Trick-or-Treating between waves, purchase them from the shopkeeper for permanent use, and build a loadout that customizes the difficulty of every run!

name: Ancient Villa
description:
A famous archaeologist and her penguin companion went to a medieval castle-villa to inspect it in all details. Three months have already passed yet we have not received any news from her. Will she return with new discoveries?

A 3D Puzzle/Exploration Homebrew for PSVITA Originally made for TWG25 game jam by Cojam Team.

name: Killing Floor: Horzine Outbreak
description: Horzine Outbreak is based on original Killing Floor mod (KFMod) v1.0 for Unreal Tournament 2004 by Alex Quick and tell a story about incident in Horzine Biotech, currently in progress and being made by the last version of Xash3D + XashXT.

name: Synth Riders Experience: Barbie Dance 'n Dream
description: A world inspired by Barbie flows all around you while you play and dance to the rhythm. Soak in rays at the beach and groove at the roller disco while bopping along to K-pop hit, “Barbie Dreams (feat. Kaliii)” by FIFTY FIFTY from Barbie the Album.

name: Mars Explorer
description:
Mars Explorer is an online game for multiple players that combines racing, dogfights and exploration all set on the deserted landscape of the planet Mars. Choosing between a buggy and a hovercraft, the game offers rocky landscapes to explore, with volcanoes, elevated plateaus and lava flows.

There is free exploration, but also game modes such as laser tag or foxholes (reach the highest speed). Different camera perspectives are combined with the option to fly. When riding up a hill at a high speed, the buggy can extend its flaps to fly. This can be combined with shooting from a first person perspective, either using the mouse of the keyboard to combine these actions.

The game mechanics are introduced on a tutorial map and players can then join servers set up by others, or create a new server and optionally add AI-controlled bots. Players can chat while playing using text and the graphics scale back and forth automatically based on the available bandwidth, though it also possible to lock them at a certain setting.

name: The Succession of Changing Kings
description: A turn-based kingdom management simulator, with an emphasis on decision making. Will you survive and lead the kingdom to prosperity or die in obscurity? The throne awaits you.

name: Slot Car VR
description:
Slot Car VR is a sandbox building and racing game, that allows you to transform your home into the ultimate racing track for you and others to enjoy.
Bringing back the nostalgia and joy of slot car racing in your home, but this time it's even better!
With limitless track and the ability to save, upload and race tracks with the community, your imagination is your only limitation!

name: Shoot-Up Barney
description: Sin descripción

name: Barney Carnage
description: Sin descripción

name: Barney Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Purple Dinosaur Massacre
description: Sin descripción

name: Barney: The Land of Make Believe
description: Sin descripción

name: Mima's Magical Wardrobe
description: Help Mima get ready for a hot date. Or maybe it's for a job interview? Maybe it's for protesting on the streets. Who knows?

name: Red Haze: Bruises Glimmer in Starlight
description: Gretta finds something alluringly beautiful, yet horrendously terrible​ hidden deep within her apartment. It grows beneath the floorboards. Will it bring her happiness, or sink her into despair?

name: Storage Anomaly
description: Storage Anomaly is a memory and puzzle game in which you have to identify anomalies in a dark and spooky storage room using your phone, while overcoming unexpected challenges.

name: 2000s Rock Legends: Music Pack
description: Get ready to rock with the '2000s Rock Legends' DLC for Smash Drums! Featuring iconic banger tunes from a decade of musical revolution, this pack brings you 5 of the most celebrated hits that defined the rock scene of the early millennium. Immerse yourself in the beats that fueled legendary festivals and iconic rock moments. Don't miss out on this blast from the past—turn up the volume and let the nostalgia kick in!

name: Vertigo 2: Into the Aether
description: Into the Aether is a story expansion for Vertigo 2. Embark on an interdimensional expedition to the oldest and most mysterious universe, discover new weapons and tools, and defeat fearsome new enemies.

name: Super Star Trek
description: A 'Star Trek' variant originally written by Bob Leedom in BASIC for the Data General Nova minicomputer, adding many new features that would be included in most port from then on, including moving enemy ships, navigation, and an expanded 64x64 grid space. This version later became well known when the code was found and published by David Ahl in his 1978 edition of 'BASIC Computer Games'.

name: Spleezy Park
description: Spleezy Park is an horror parkour-themed game where you enter in a park to search for your little brother, but you didn't knew what you would need to kill to get to him.

name: Seedbo And That Time The Sun Exploded
description: Re-assemble the sun in this bite-sized adventure platformer!

name: Bricksbumpbump
description: bricksbumpbump is a local multiplayer party game (supporting up to 4 players). In the game, you need to control your character to move and stack blocks like building with toy bricks to achieve the game objectives. The first one to meet the objective wins the game.

name: Cursed Baby
description: The once #1 horror game on the Horror list of Itch is back! Join now and use a variety of repair tools to experience life as a handyman in a haunted house, uncover the terrifying past of this old house and face the terrifying demon baby head-on!

name: The Patient: Can you escape?
description: The Patient is a classic escape game in ego perspective where you find yourself in a Sanatorium in the 1930s. Explore the mysterious location and solve cunning Puzzles to progress further. But stay alert, you are not alone! Will you be able to find your way out?

name: Pet'n'Run
description: Pet’n’Run is a Mixed Reality game where you take control of your favorite animals and pet them through levels full of crazy obstacles and challenges.

name: Little Adventure Tale
description: Little Adventure tale is a Roguelike Deckbuilder set in a cute fantasy world where you can enlist the help of the Guild to Hire companions and manage several Card Decks & Accept Quests to earn more rewards! All this in order to banish the Evil Lord Obradin!

name: Trials of Yarbil
description: In this top-down roguelike you must think creatively to take advantage of your resources and best your enemies. You are a samurai wizard and to prove your worth you must complete the Trials of Yarbil.

name: TailScape: The corgi’s Advendture
description: Tailscape is a Metroidvania game starring a cute puppy. Solve hidden puzzles and sometimes face large enemies to fill in the story of the bond between humans and animals.

name: BlackGate
description: In this asymmetrical multiplayer experience, every player has a unique role to play, with one ultimate goal: survival. Up to 4 Engineers are pit against an alien specimen controlled by a 5th player.

name: CloserLook VR: Oldway
description: CLoserLook: Old Ways, a captivating interactive story VR adventure game set in modern day west Africa. Awakening in a locked university administrative building, you'll need to solve a series of intricate puzzles to find your way out. As you navigate through the game, explore secret locations and uncover a gripping narrative that delves into themes of exploitation, corruption, and betrayal.

name: Galactic Traffic Control
description: Draw paths for ships to follow, avoid crashes , destroy enemies , and navigate cosmic obstacles to get high scores & unlock power-ups across 4 challenging game modes + 3 difficulties in this mixed-reality arcade game.

name: Sonic Switch
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Fairy
description: A new wintery map: Black Fairy on its black red wings! Contains lots of enemies, explosions, boom-booms, and there's also one snowman. In addition, it contains a calmer variation of the map called "White Noiz" which is meant to be played after Black Fairy

name: Chaos Control
description: Sin descripción

name: Age of Wonders 4: Ways of War
description: Achieve perfection in battle with Age of Wonders 4: Ways of War. Embrace the Oathsworn culture and devote yourself to their warrior's code. Deploy disciplined monks and shadowy assassins. Investigate mysterious happenings that see your fellow Godir replaced by demons and dragons. Lead two new forms for your factions: the hulking Ogrekin or the strong Simians. This content pack contains a new culture, new tomes, new wildlife units and a new type of narrative event chain.

name: Age of Wonders 4: Giant Kings
description: Restore the Elder Giants to their rightful place as masters of the Astral Sea, in the Age of Wonders 4: Giant Kings Expansion. Explore the ruins of their fallen empire, seek out forgotten crystal magic to empower your armies, and delve for forgotten treasures deep beneath the earth. Contains a new giant ruler type, dwelling and hand crafted regions to explore.

name: Age of Wonders 4: Archon Prophecy
description: Take command of the forces of light, in the Age of Wonders 4: Archon Prophecy Expansion. Join the celestial Archons as they strike back against Urrath’s corrupt forces. Consult the oracles and glimpse the hidden prophecies that shape the fates of the realms, and become the master of your own destiny. Contains a new culture, story content and prophecy events.

name: Magical Girls vs. Cat Aliens
description: Magical Girls vs Cat Aliens is a casual run and shoot game where you control a highschool girl fighting against the cat alien invasion. By charging her magical brooch she can transform into a powerful magical girl! Use your wand to shoot magical blasts on the enemies and dash to avoid being hit, because once attack can undo the transformation and you will have to survive on your own, without powers, until you can transform again! Can the magical girl bring the city's public safety to the maximum? Defeat alien cats and collect crystals to increase the public safety and the crystals can also be used to unlock new powerful wands!

name: Sonic Axiom
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Neo Genesis
description: Sin descripción

name: Golf With Your Friends 2
description: Tee off in Golf With Your Friends 2! Dive into 12-player chaos, wild new course mechanics, a revamped level editor, and nonstop fun—play together no matter how and where your friends play!

name: Knuckles Treasure Hunt
description: Sin descripción

name: Solitomb
description: Use your solitaire skills to assemble powerful combos and defeat the dungeon's monsters. Grab treasure and spend it to build a set of powerful, synergistic abilities to help you. Manage both your own resources and the demon's patience to hopefully survive the ordeal.

name: Seal of Solitomb
description: Use your solitaire skills to assemble sweet combos and defeat the dungeon's monsters. Grab treasure and spend it on powerful, synergistic abilities. Manage both your own resources and the demon's patience to hopefully survive the ordeal.

name: Inn Hand
description: Inn Hand is an atmospheric god game and casual management sim that places you in the role of a magical deity operating a cozy isometric inn. Replace your mouse cursor with a spectral hand to tend to your patrons' needs in exchange for gold and reviews, ensuring your inn thrives!

name: LepozhdianVibe
description:
Lepozhdian Vibe is an immersive simulator inspired by the synthwave aesthetic and the 1980s. It's a game where creativity and freedom take center stage. We offer a variety of modes: sandbox, classic shooters, arcade racing, social dynamic modes like Mafia, and even an editor where you can create your own maps, stories, and worlds.

Lepozhdian presents a unique game that knows it’s a game. In this experience, reality and the game world intertwine, breaking the fourth wall. Characters discuss their roles, the game’s rules, and even address the player directly, creating an unforgettable experience. It’s more than a game — it’s a reflection on what a game truly is.

There are no strict boundaries in the game. Want to build a city? Go ahead. Prefer competition? Host races or battles with friends. It's all up to you.

Our game supports multiplayer, style customization, and VR. Want to play in your own atmosphere, with personalized interface settings and weapons? No problem. Most importantly, we've added modding capabilities through a built-in programming language. Everything you need for creativity is already in the game.

Lepozhdian Vibe is a free game with no microtransactions. However, the project's support relies entirely on you. Subscribe to our Patreon if you'd like to help us make the game even better.

This format allows us to continually develop and improve the game, respond promptly to your feedback, add new content, fix bugs, and implement innovative ideas. This gives us the flexibility to keep the game fresh and engaging for you over a long period of time.

We are confident that this approach will allow us to create something truly special and captivating. Together with you, we can develop a game that will bring joy for years to come.

name: Already Dead
description: Classic 90's style survival horror, reimagined for VR.

name: Lucky Pikinini: Zombie Rampage
description: First-Person Linear Story-Telling Game, 7 Chapter 6 Hours Long Story, Verde Diamente Presidente Francisco Antonio Rodriguez Mobilizes La National Policia And Defense Force To Combat An Outbreak Of Zombies, Calling For The Manhunt, Arrest And Prosecution Of 3 Scientists Who Made The Outbreak

name: Dumb Ways Free For All
description: A new dumb adventure awaits with Dumb Ways: Free For All! Available on the Quest 2, Quest 3 and 3s, play solo or bring up to FIVE other players along to experience the dumb mayhem together. Embark on a ‘mostly-safe’ vacation where each destination brings wild activities and unexpected surprises - all in the form of crazy, fun-filled minigames!

name: Axyn Adventure
description: Axyn Adventure is a retro style 3D platformer. You take control of the titular character Axyn and embark on many adventures with your friends Yunn and Leaf. Play in the vast open levels using your big set of moves to get around. Collect as many items as you can to advance the story and unlock tons of content.

name: DigiGods: Build and Battle
description: Create, play, & share in a physics-based sandbox environment where you can shoot, parkour, or simulate any type of gameplay you desire, taking the best of VR goofiness.

name: Merlin's Chess
description: Merlin's Chess is a fantasy-themed VR chess game brings a completely new gameplay experience to the greatest strategy game ever. Explore an immersive and enchanting way to play chess.

name: Alentejo: Tinto's Law
description:
A Gundown Satiric Western, set in the 19th Century Iberian Penisula!

Trains, outlaws, kegs, contraband. Welcome to 19th-century Alentejo, a land where the scorching sun and mysteries are ever-present. Meet Gildo and help him assemble his gang to stand against Baron Tinto's tyrannical rule. Travel across various locations, explore caves and mines, cross the border into Spain, and challenge Tinto and his oppressive lawmaking.

name: The Fisherman: A Codfish Tale
description: Set in 1942 during World War II, experience the challenges and homesickness faced by the sailors as they navigate the Greenland Seas to fish cod. Immerse yourself in an emotional narrative with dialogues in authentic old Portuguese slang and fulfill the duties of a traditional fisherman as you unravel the tragic fate of the ship.

name: AAA Simulator
description: Become the CEO of a AAA studio and make important decisions like who to hire and who to fire. Handle events like a pro by making acquisitions or layoffs. Steer the company in any direction as long as it satisfies shareholders - and that means maximizing profit!

name: Turmoil
description: Sin descripción

name: Portal Balls
description: ROLL INTO ACTION!

name: Combat The Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Boomerang Of Destruction
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Shoot-em-up Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Hajwala 2
description: HAJWALA 2 amps up high-speed drift racing in vast Gulf-inspired open worlds. With realistic car physics, stunning graphics, and new third-person characters, players can race, drift, and explore with total freedom. Experience the thrill of HAJWALA like never before.

name: Popotinho's Adventures
description: Guide a mischievous kid back to his parents in a vibrant side-scrolling adventure!

name: Steel Swarm: Apocalypse
description: SSA is a next-gen MOBA: 5 vs 5 players fight in 3 lanes to destroy enemy HQ. Yet, SSA advances the genre: Battle enemy heroes weaving through swarms, explore the jungle accomplishing missions, enhance your build with mods and upgrades, and demolish the city to forge new paths altering the map.

name: We Three Gifts
description: We Three Gifts is a single MBF21 map for Doom 2 (MAP01) made by Dreadopp and Lord_ Z utilizing the 32in24-15 texture pack and some of Doom Christmas: Enhanced's resources.

name: Pizza Maker
description: Become a pizzeria owner

name: Anime Girls: Lovely Lolita
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: 10-in-1 Christmas Collection
description: 10 games with guaranteed entertaining fun await you in this Christmas Collection!

name: Eggconsole Aqua Polis SOS MSX
description: A shooting game depicting a rescue drama set in an underwater city. Avoid obstacles and missile interference as you save the people of the underwater city!

name: Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire
description: Master the Kitchen and Build Your Empire!

name: Arcade Archives: Viper Phase 1
description:
Heroes will surely return.
Carrying the hope of the entire galaxy.

name: Airborne Grannies
description: Care Plan: Defying Gravity and Age

name: Sweet Neighbor BB
description: Sweet Neighbor BB - is a beat 'em up brick breaking game. Players can choose the room they want to break in a building full of girls. Players only need to break all the bricks in the room to appreciate the beauty of the girls in the viewing mode at any time of Tutu.

name: Sweet Sky
description: Sweet SKY - is a simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photo in the gallery.

name: Great Powers At War
description: Create your hero, lead a legendary fantasy faction, and conquer your foes in strategic turn-based hex combat. Oversee economy maintenance, technology research, and hero progression to ensure your people dominate their rivals across worlds near and far.

name: What's a King to a God
description: You are a begrudging hero who has just overthrown God and must assume the role yourself. Manipulate heroes, monsters, and locations across the map to keep the realm at peace while building enough resources to stop the cycle of Chaos once and for all.

name: Cat's Dream
description: Cat's Dream is a pixel-style puzzle game in which players take on the role of Cat Meow that turns into a human, on a fantasy one-day adventure. The reason for all this seems to have something to do with her owner Song...

name: Food Fight: Culinary Combat
description: Get ready to splat, splash, and spill as you mess it up with friends in this family-friendly shooter! Customize your character, chat it up with iconic Atari characters, and blast your way to claim the cone in this reimagined classic!

name: Permuter
description: Permuter is a synthwave-style autobattler inspired by Geometry Wars 3's Pacifism mode. Control an agile ship, weave through enemies, buy and stack game-changing upgrades, choose your build carefully to gain synergy bonuses, and defeat the challenging elite bosses.

name: Need Two Survive
description: horror co-op game, try to escape from the horrible death trap of the mad scientist: Pas Fin. A portal and SAW inspired game that will put your nerves and trust in your friend at edge. good luck you stinky peasents

name: Number Fields
description: Number Fields is a logic game where players uncover tiles indicating the proximity of hidden bombs and treasures. Choose your difficulty, customize grid sizes, and enjoy. Provides a way to stay fully engaged while calming nervous energy discreetly.

name: Versus Go
description: Welcome to Versus GO! Versus GO is a shooter game with a 3rd person camera angle that you can play over Lan or with bots. It is a shooter game where you can compete against your enemies in multiple game modes and game maps.

name: Ogre Man
description: Ogre Man is a challenging retro inspired 2d Action Platformer. You get to pick the order of the levels, and earn new abilities from defeated bosses. It has fun original characters and music.

name: Beat Meet
description: Sin descripción

name: Nordic Racing
description: Nordic Racing is an exhilarating open-world driving adventure set in the stunning landscapes of the Nordic region. Experience the thrill of the road as you explore diverse maps, from icy fjords and dense forests to bustling cities and serene countryside. Choose from a wide array of vehicles.

name: Foxes' Festival
description: Travel around town completing mini-games to help the villagers get ready for the fall festival in the evening.

name: DCS World: Mi-8MTV2 and Ka-50: Memory of a Hero Campaign by Stone Sky
description: The Memory of the Hero campaign follows the story of helicopter pilot Sergey Pavlovich Borisov. Being an honored sniper and research helicopter pilot and a hero of the Soviet Union and Russia, this campaign explores his experiences in the Mi-8MTV2 and the Ka-50 Black Shark. The campaign is full of danger and exciting moments as you relive some of his more harrowing experiences!

name: DCS World: NS 430 Navigation System for C-101EB by Eagle Dynamics, Aerges
description: The NS 430 for the C-101EB module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the C-101EB cockpit (not as a pop-up display).

name: DCS World: NS 430 Navigation System for Mi-8MTV2 Cockpit
description: The NS 430 for the Mi-8MTV2 module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the Mi-8MTV2 cockpit (not as a pop-up display). The NS 430 is fully wired into the electrical and radio systems of the Mi-8MTV2.

name: Stella of The End: Diary of a Faint Hope
description:
Doujin game adapting the official Stella of the End after story book.

The after story unfolds in the form of a diary, set in a post-apocalyptic world. The human protagonist, Rafe, had a very miserable childhood. Everything changed when he met the courier, Philia.

name: The Noexistencen of You and Me
description: Use "game" as a medium to showcase the world of "you/girl". Explore the truth of "you/girl/world" through the form of a "visual novel".

name: Blasted Dice
description: Blasted Dice is a roguelike deckbuilder where you assemble a deck of dice to blow up your enemies. Achieve masterful combos, acquire legendary items, meet strange characters and blow up your enemies with your very own dice launcher.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Tokaido Freight Line (Nebukawa to Tokyo, Shinjuku) E257-2000, 5500 Series
description:
Tōkaidō Freight Line is the common name for tracks on the Tōkaidō Main Line dedicated to freight trains that are separated from passenger trains (freight lines) and branch lines attached to the main line that are mainly used by freight trains (freight branch lines).

Generally, it refers to a series of freight lines and freight branch lines from Hamamatsuchō Station to Odawara Station.

The Tōkaidō Freight Line runs a variety of freight trains to and from the Kansai, Kyūshū regions, some limited express “Shōnan” trains during morning and evening hours, and test runs of new trains and crew training during daytime hours. The trains run alongside passenger lines, pass through long tunnels and elevated shelters through residential areas, and pass through a number of freight stations, allowing to enjoy the unique view of the freight line.

In this DLC, you can drive from Odawara Station to Tōkyō Station via the Tōkaidō Freight Line and Hinkaku Line (Yokosuka Line), which are separate routes from passenger lines, and to Shinjyuku Station via the Yamanote Freight Line.

We hope you will enjoy the different scenery from the passenger line.

name: In The Foundations
description: A horror visual novel about coming home to your childhood home.

name: Saloon King
description: A short, cinematic western shooter with wild, fast-paced spray 'n' pray action! Help a sharp-shootin' renegade on a mission to take over the saloon. Shoot first, ask questions never. Clear out anyone daring enough to stand in your way!

name: Echoes of Heroes: Legends Never Die
description: Pixel Art Roguelite Fantasy Team Builder Turn-Base RPG

name: Revenge of the Mage
description: RotM is an Action Roguelite FPS game where players get in the robes of a Mage. Let the hands of fate open ways for the power of your magic. Save the Multiverse to power up yourself! Unlock, collect, discover, live, die, repeat!

name: DCS World: NS 430 Navigation System for L-39С Cockpit
description: The NS 430 for the L-39 module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the L-39C cockpit (not as a pop-up display). The NS 430 is fully wired into the electrical and radio systems of the L-39.

name: Terminull Brigade
description: Rise in the virtual rebellion to free the Nullverse in this action-packed roguelike game together with other players, or alone. Master your Rogueteers with distinct playstyles and customizable builds and break out from the binaric destiny with the Terminull Brigade.

name: Caustic Industry
description: DBP69: Caustic Industry is a new limit-removing (cl2) megawad designed for Doom 2, with maps made by the Doomer Boards over the course of two months, led by @BiZ. The project theme was 'Industrial facilities made of rusted metal and concrete, rivers of neon nukage, and hazardous crushers.'

name: Looney Landers
description: Looney Landers is a fast-paced arcade party game for 1-2 players. Skydive into a whirlwind of chaos as you compete against friends, family, or the CPU to claim the top spot on the leaderboards in this score-chasing frenzy!

name: Toffifee: Fantasy Forest
description:
Toffifee Fantasy Forest was released in 1996 as a promotional game for advertising Toffifee, a product of Merci GmbH & Co, Berlin.

Toffifee Fantasy Forest is about a dwarf's journey to save his friends from the hands of an evil magician. He has to find his way through a forest and a cave to arrive finally at the wizard's castle.

It's a classic, jump 'n' run, side scrolling, arcade game. You can collect goodies for scorepoints and Toffifees (a kind of chocolate). With Toffifee you can buy nuts (for hitpoints) and fir cones/stones (used as ammunition to be thrown).

name: DCS World: NS 430 Navigation System for SA342 Gazelle by Eagle Dynamics, Polychop Simulations
description: The NS 430 for the SA342 Gazelle module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the SA342 Gazelle cockpit (not as a pop-up display).

name: Claire a la Mode
description: Team up with a friend or go it alone into a sugar-high adventure! Bake your dessert masterpiece and collect new bakers as you rise through a high-stakes bake-off full of cheaters. Fend off their decadent lackeys and against all odds, come out on top in a worldwide baking frenzy!

name: Agent Mirai and the Submission Machines
description: Secret Agent Mirai received information that a certain pharmaceutical company is conducting illegal human experiments. She headed to the company to investigate on her own but was captured. In the laboratory, there were numerous sinister-looking machines. What will become of her...!?

name: Resident Evil 1: Roku's cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Zero: Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: My Reading Tutor
description: A fun & effective way to help children conquer early reading with exercises, activities & interactive books! Exercises, activities & interactive books to practice: Phonics, Fluency, Vocabulary & Comprehension. Based on award winning My Virtual Tutor Series University Developed & Tested in 50 schools with 2500 students 14 Complete Story Books to read Teaches 8 Phonics and Reading Concepts Parent Mode tracks child’s progress Individualized Instruction

name: Unforgivable?
description: Unforgivable? is a narrative driven game where you are thrown into a mediating role, having but 5 days to convince a group of terrorists who claim to be animals taken human form to free their captive humans. Playing as Sheep, you speak with the terrorists. Your approach will determine the fate of everyone involved.

name: Project: Amica
description: Project: AMICA is a first person shooter built in the GZDoom engine. You play the role of SID, an android set out to defeat General Genant Kekaha in order to prevent further military conflict. Explore a colorful 90's inspired world of robots, cool power ups and weapons! Collect power ups that change the way you tackle combat scenarios and exploration. Revisit areas you've already been to and explore new paths and secrets that'll help you throughout your journey!

name: Bendy: Lone Wolf
description: Bendy: Lone Wolf will tests your ability to survive against ever increasing odds. Monsters and obstacles emerge from every direction as you journey into the rubberhose halls of the world's most evil animation studio. Every day is a challenge.

name: Superhero Market
description: Become the manager of a dynamic supermarket! Manage inventory, optimize store design, plan shelves and improve the customer experience. In this immersive management game, every decision counts to develop your business and satisfy your customers. Are you ready to take on the challenge?

name: Greed Stays Home
description: A horror walking sim that emphasizes atmosphere, tension, fear, and immersive storytelling, all heightened by well-timed jump scares. The game takes place in a village frozen in time, stuck somewhere in the mid-20th century.

name: Low Poly Stories: Mist
description: Low Poly Stories: Mist is an action-adventure RPG set in a dark fantasy world. Explore, fight, and survive are your main objectives as you uncover the truth behind the mist that shrouds the kingdom.

name: Escape Together: Secrets of the Professor
description: Gather your best problem solving friends or go in alone in this VR Escape Room game, that features both singleplayer and multiplayer with cross platform support. Can you uncover the secrets of the professor and escape?

name: Tides of Lava
description: A strategic tower defense roguelike game with a grid-based building system and constantly changing enemy paths and environments. Manage your builders efficiently to defend your base against a variety of enemies. Adaptiveness is key to winning - do you have what it takes?

name: Glintseeker Island
description: Explore procedurally generated dungeons, uncover exciting secrets, excavate countless treasures, and fight enemies and bosses. Save the island from a mysterious threat below!

name: Detective Mikami
description: The outbreak has hit the entire world like a truck. Yet, in some respects, the infestation of the population has affected Mikami and Hirano the most. That is because the two of them are so unlike one another yet they are stuck together, trying to live through this new, dangerous world.

name: Cluck and Conquer
description: Command an army of battle-ready chickens in this roguelite, micro-focused RTS. Hatch new units, expand your numbers and upgrade your flock into an unstoppable clucking force of destruction!

name: Victoria: La Primera
description: Immerse yourself in the world of the nao Victoria, a ship with its own spirit and personality that historically sailed around the world for the first time. Explore mysterious places by point-and-click and face challenges that will test your wits.

name: Nitrogen Narcosis
description: Nitrogen Narcosis is a thalassophobes deep diving nightmare, set in sinking and sunk abandoned facilities. You and up to 7 other employees wearing the cheapest deep-dive suit money can buy are sent in to recover old materials from these facilities and return it to your captains submarine!

name: Paath-Z
description: PAATH-Z is an intense third-person shooter blending tactical combat and survival horror. Play as a PHANTOM operative Dominic 'Shadow' Kane, infiltrating a secretive island to uncover dark experiments, battle mutated creatures, and dismantle a shadowy corporate conspiracy threatening humanity.

name: Snow Bros. Special: Anniversary Edition
description: “It is a modern remake of Snow Bros., an arcade platform-based action game popular in 1990, characterized by its accessibility for people of all ages. It also provides diverse fun with new stages and new modes, and allows players to enjoy the original game as well.”

name: Outsiders
description: In this co-op Survival Horror game, two shipwrecked survivors are stranded on an uncharted island, facing terrifying creatures and puzzles. Work together to explore, survive, and uncover the island's dark secrets before it consumes you both.

name: Super 3D Maze 16
description: Trapped in a neon labyrinth, Elias Nova wished he'd played Super 3D Maze 16 during his astronaut training. Unfortunately, he didn't, so it'll be up to you, intrepid gamer, to guide Elias through these mazes in search of a way out.

name: Test Subject
description: An action-packed single-player FPS where you fight your way off an alien ship using fists and power-ups. Test your strength, wits, and resilience to survive and escape.

name: Decending Horror
description: Find your self in a long lost place with not a sane sentence spoken.

name: Gangs of Neo Tokyo
description: Dominate the streets of Neo Tokyo in this high-speed motorbike brawler. Inspired by classic cyberpunk anime and retro road combat games, fight rival gangs and claim the neon-lit highways as your own.

name: Dino Dash
description: We get caught collecting a dinosaur's eggs and it's trying not to get caught.

name: Holidays Survivors
description: Fight to save the holiday season as Santa, a Deer, or an Elf! Battle hordes of mutated insect-like infected and demonic foes in action-packed survival gameplay. Bring joy back to the snow-covered lands!

name: City Heist
description: A thief steals diamonds from the bank and tries to escape from the security guards and get the highest score.

name: Cropolution
description: In Cropolution, you're not just a farmer—you're a pioneer in the future of agriculture! Join forces with a team of scientists as you experiment and evolve entirely new species of crops, bugs, and fish. Will you rise to the challenge and revolutionize the world's ecosystems?

name: Corner World
description: Game where you can build, break or craft things.

name: Cryst
description: In this action-packed game, unknown creatures invade a factory and steal diamond pieces. Your mission is to play through exciting stages, recover the missing pieces of diamond scattered across various locations, and restore them to the factory.

name: Crystal Rail
description:
A rail-roguelike train game with a handpainted artstyle set in a crystalpunk fantasy world. Create a train and make deliveries to strike it rich, but every few turns, a revolution overthrows the government, changes the rules and eliminates the poorest teams! Last one standing wins!

Taking equal inspiration from roguelike deckbuilders and modern board games, Crystal Rail offers an addictive, unique spin on the strategy roguelike, with a cast of iconic conductors all based on extinct animals.

name: Jinro Metropolis
description: Jinro Metropolis is an online, turn-based voice chat Werewolf and debate app!

name: Purgatory
description: A 34 Level Megawad Inspired by PSX Doom & Doom 64 with heavy influence from Doom 3 & Quake

name: Infernal Legions
description: Infernal Legions is a single map in MBF21 format that reimagines Alien Vendetta map 25: Demonic Hordes.

name: Broken Psyche
description: Play as a detective investigating his wife's disappearance. Suspecting the asylum she was researching, he infiltrates it, only to uncover a realm of horror. Solve puzzles, maintain sanity, and confront monsters as you unravel the asylum's secrets.

name: Starving Cat
description: Starving Cat is a third person sci-fi shooter where you explore planets and fight monsters to find food for scientist cat Simon.

name: Ascendrix
description: The ascent nightmare

name: Secrets In Green
description: When a pretty plant in Alma's garden begins to speak to her, she knows that a dark mystery is afoot! But in Victorian England, women are often dismissed as nothing more than hysterical fantasists. Can you help Alma find her power, and solve this dangerous situation before it's too late?

name: Purrgonia
description: There are many things hidden within the unexplored wilderness. Venture into a mysterious forest to gather resources so you can rebuild the village of Purrgonia. Bring back life to the forgotten lands but be wary: the illusive serenity can make you forget about the true dangers of this place.

name: Island of Sacrifice
description: An indie horror and puzzles game created by a solo developer using the Unreal Engine 5 (UE5). Challenge your mind, think differently, and immerse yourself in a unique and thrilling experience.

name: Dead Streets: Zombie Blitz
description: Dive into the adrenaline-pumping action of Dead Streets: Zombie Blitz, where the fate of the city rests in your hands! This action-packed shooter throws you into a city overrun by the undead, transforming every corner into a battle for survival.

name: Dig Night
description: Dark comical RPG set in a city at night and a spiritual world.

name: Galaxy Hassle
description: Step into the shoes of Corelatine Rangers Ralph and Brad, as they steer their way through Asteroid Fields and Monsters a-plenty, to arrest Dr. Jillkoy - A menace known for his deadly atrocities towards intergalactic citizens. Do you have what it takes to see him behind bars?

name: Prop Hunt Rumble
description: Welcome to Prop Hunt Rumble, the multiplayer hide-and-seek game where hunters use their fingers as magical projectiles and props have ingenious abilities to turn the tables! Get ready for a hilarious experience filled with strategy, bluffing, and guaranteed laughter!

name: Heavenly Way Legend
description: “Heavenly Way Legend” is a casual game set against the backdrop of Chinese xianxia. You will play as a cultivator, cultivating, fighting, exploring, and having fun in various spaces.

name: Taiwan Love Story⁵
description: "Taiwan Love Story ⁵" is a romantic interactive novel. To write a thesis on love, you meet girls from different parts of Taiwan. As you conduct your academic research, you gradually become captivated by them, leading to a series of sweet, bittersweet, and complex romantic encounters.

name: Tinkerlands
description: Explore, craft, and fight your way on the uncharted islands solo or in co-op! Tinkerlands is an exciting survival adventure where you will build your settlement, craft useful tools to survive, and even use magic!

name: What Is in the Black Box?
description: Prepare to embark on a journey of reflection, where you’ll seek answers to profound questions and uncover the ultimate truth: What truly lies within the black box?

name: A.C.E.: Air Combat Elite
description:
Unique 360° free flying air combat game! Fly five fighters to reveal the conspiracy behind the most famous air combat tournament and win the title of “ACE”!
Please feedback to help@nebulastudio.cn. We will hear you and adapt your suggestions!

name: Lucky Pirate: Uncharted Territory
description:
The Lucky Pirate is a casual mobile game between luck, strategy and deck building.
In the game you build small decks of cards to generate coins. Earn enough coins with the right combination of cards and you win. Simple as that.

name: 3-Bit Explorer
description: 3-Bit Explorer follows its predecessors, being a game focused on world exploration. This time you find yourself lost in a forest that seems to have even more bits than you, making this world even stranger to our hero. Once more, the world does not need saving, but you need to find your way home (and also a good adventure).

name: Rocket League: Painted Power Bundle
description: The Painted Power bundle is available for a limited time! Unlock Gold Painted Octane, Gold Painted Dueling Dragons Goal Explosion, and more Painted Black Market and Exotic items.

name: Mini Dungeon
description: Explore "mini dungeons" in search of treasures while facing unique creatures in this action roguelike where you create your own weapons and strategies.

name: Crafter
description:
Welcome to the world of crafting and adventure!

In Crafter, you step into the shoes of a skilled medieval artisan. Collect materials, master your crafting techniques, and run your own shop in this hybrid casual mobile game with idle and RPG elements. Whether you’re crafting powerful weapons, enchanting mystical artifacts, or managing your customers’ satisfaction, your journey as an artisan is packed with fun and strategy.

name: Another Christmas Game
description: In this game, you follow Lucas, a 16-year-old teenager who decides to spend Christmas alone at home until he realizes that he's not as alone as he thought.

name: 1000: The All-Mother's Embrace
description:
The washed-out red line traces a confident path away from the labyrinth city, toward the lands of dreams strewn with golden petals.
Were that line to break, a story would start. A story of the boundless and the omnipotent, of the minuscule and the fragile.

name: Human Within
description: Human Within combines an original branching storyline with video game playability. Its unique blend of storytelling and gameplay offers players a one-of-a-kind interactive experience.

name: Paper Bride 6: Nightmare
description: "Paper Bride 6 Nightmare” is the sixth work to the Paper Bride series. Dive into a bewitching dream and immerse yourself in yet another immersive Chinese horror puzzle game!

name: Shuumatsu no Sugoshikata: The world is drawing to an W/end
description: In a week the human race will perish. In this situation the hero keeps going to school while everyone gives up. What is there ahead?

name: ParallHex
description: ParallHex is a puzzle game where you'll navigate increasingly challenging levels. Solve puzzles simultaneously in two distinct worlds, interconnected by your every move.

name: Planet Factory
description: A small quick game about building a factory to launch planets into a solar system! Grow your base and increase production to make the ultimate factory for launching planets!

name: Fallen Cage
description: A 3D action game where you control an angel striving to escape from a prison.The objective is to overcome waves of enemies using a variety of firearms and collect six hearts.Engage in combat to reclaim your freedom and take flight once again.

name: Anemone
description: This is a board game set in the fictional Japanese city of "Neverland." Enjoy local multiplayer with simple mouse-based controls. Original music and an unusual world await you

name: Karma
description: Explore the mysterious world of hell in this walking simulator. Search for six hearts while encountering strange characters and impressive landscapes. The haunting music, composed for this game, draws you deeper into the depths of hell.

name: Trauma
description: "Trauma" is a walking simulator action-adventure game sprinkled with horror elements. The only action you can perform besides walking is stabbing with a knife. Enjoy your journey into the strange world of dreams.

name: Fromage
description:
A small cheesy mapset that dashiefrickintyan started in 2022 for nanowadmo featuring
2 gameplay maps and 2 intro/outro maps, inspired by stardate 20x7 and... cheese

name: Globy
description: Sin descripción

name: Days of Saturn
description:
There are sixteen days left until the Days of Saturn. Work hard, acolyte, and you may be chosen to be the Servant of the Mistress during the festivities.

A slightly creepy fantasy visual novel / stat-raising game. Made in four days for Velox Turbo 2.

name: Super Mario 64: Gore/Hard-Mode
description: Take a dive into the challenging world of Gore/Hard-Mode! Often called "Real life Mario 64", this mod originally started as a port of Kaze's Unfair Mario 64. It quickly grew into a cursed lovechild between Unfair Mario and 'I Wanna Be The Guy' sporting ridiculous obstacles and gory inspiration from both. Be prepared to die numerous times in unexpected ways!

name: Elon and the Divine Proof
description: A 3D action platformer. Elon must collect all the Burgers scattered around this mysterious place to open the passage back.

name: Denbora
description: Leap through time in Denbora, a darkly humorous 3D puzzle game. Navigate intricate puzzles and unravel the cyclical nature of the labor market, guided by a sarcastically witty AI. Each decision echoes through past and future!

name: Pragmatics
description: This is a classic match-3 puzzle game where the primary elements are colorful and uniquely shaped blocks.

name: Trouble in Warsaw
description: Trouble in Warsaw is a short, detective game, combining the genres of Visual Novel and Point&Click, featuring many puzzles, dialogues and related choices solidifying the plot and its finale.

name: Arena
description: This is an arena FPS set in a futuristic setting in which the objective is to decimate armies of robots.

name: Randungeon
description: Take on the role of a legendary hero on a quest to find the Dungeon Lord: a powerful creature lurking deep within a treacherous dungeon. Every game is different and completely random.

name: Shuriken Trigger
description: Master the ninja art of wall-running while fighting room after room of syndicate thugs and deadly robots in this top-down action shooter.

name: Stella Gladio
description: A precision platformer where you take on the role of Gladio, venturing into a mysterious magical tower with your companion—a sentient, talking sword "Stella".

name: Snails vs. Humans
description: Let the battle between snails and humans begin!

name: Mini Crawler
description: Sin descripción

name: Protory Jigen
description: 3D x 2D action with multiple shifting game genres! What awaits you after crossing the worlds?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Singapore
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Singapore landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Rome
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Rome landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Miami
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Miami landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Madrid
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Madrid landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 108 Silly Ways to Die
description: Caichen made an appointment with a female netizen from the same school to meet at an abandoned medical college, but was caught up in a conspiracy. Caichen planned to explore here and find a way to escape, but the sudden roar and the appearance of zombies implied that there were secrets hidden here.

name: 10 Blaze Escape
description: Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing!

name: 10min Heroes
description: A 2D pixel survival game where you defeat waves of enemies and aim for the goal. Face over 50 types of enemies, wield 20+ unique weapons, and grow stronger as you progress through each stage. "Become stronger and reach the goal!"

name: Alpaca Party
description: Alpaca Party is a free VR Party game. In this game, you can enjoy thrilling Werewolf gameplay, strategize with friends. You can also explore mysterious realms through portals,Whether you love strategic puzzles or relaxed social play, Alpaca Party has something for everyone.

name: Logic Mahjong Souryuu
description: Sin descripción

name: Kuroshiro no Avesta: Refusal Kyozetsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Sorry
description: You play as a salaryman who gets caught in various everyday troubles and overcomes them with acrobatic bows. From boss reprimands to client complaints and family issues, showcase your elegant apology skills across different scenarios. What shocking ending awaits?

name: Haunting Record: Phantom Street
description: You find yourself on a street both unfamiliar and strangely familiar, where eerie events unfold one after another. Restless spirits linger here, their resentment palpable, as if waiting to drag you into the abyss…

name: All In Everyday
description: Winning gets you a model, losing means no life. Reincarnation follows, give it another shot! Don't talk to me about game theory, probability, or value regression, I'm all in! With a leverage that reaches the sky, I'm all in!

name: Linesgo
description: Based on hardcore logic, break out of the box and solve "impossible" problems! By tapping to guide the red square forward, the blue will follow you in the opposite direction - there is only one condition for victory: make the three squares connected by a straight line contain red, yellow, and blue.

name: Maze Company
description: A short horror walking simulator where you just head from the workroom to the exit. Something may happen along the way, but don't worry, just keep going.Your goal is to return.

name: Runaway Home: Mili and Chocolate
description: "Runaway Home: Mili and Chocolate" is a romance visual novel game. On your usual way home, you come across a runaway girl on the roadside. What follows is a heart-pounding cohabitation, and a gradual revelation of the girl's mysterious past.

name: Karen Ready！
description: You run your own perfume store as the owner of a perfume store. A sudden accident has involved you in the investigation of your own resurrection from the dead. The truth gradually emerges with three employees - a love affair about perfume. Harvest the memories of your own heartbeat in the game!

name: Fuuraiki
description: Sin descripción

name: Murder&Spies
description: From the creator of hit mobile game "Spy.io" comes "Murder&Spies", a unique take on the multiplayer murder mystery genre. In this online social deduction game, every player is a spy with a single objective: eliminate your assigned target while staying hidden from the spy hunting you.

name: Quantum Joe
description: Quantum Joe is a precision pixel platformer with 100+ levels of fun, fast-paced retro-arcade style. Complete challenges and unlock stickers to decorate your play area, build custom levels with built-in level maker and share them through Steam Workshop. Includes single player and local co-op.

name: Hood RPG
description: Dark Humor & Satire: Experience a story that blends comedic mischief with clever parody, ensuring laughs and surprises at every turn. Engage in unconventional turn-based battles. Be ready to fall over laughing!

name: Panda Eat Bamboo
description: Escape the busy pace of life and immerse yourself in the calming embrace of nature with our delightful healing game. Spend quality time with charming pandas, de-stress, and rediscover your peace of mind.

name: Square Farm
description: Sin descripción

name: One Room: Yui Hanasaka Memorial
description: A new immersive animated novel game where you can experience the story of Yui Hanasaka, the main heroine of the popular short anime series OneRoom, from the protagonist’s point of view.

name: The Ghost That Lives Inside My Piano
description: Sin descripción

name: Omega Phenex Commenced Project Six
description: You will become a pilot of the mech “Icarus,” which has tremendous maneuverability. You will enjoy a fight and face large powerful armies and rivals by moving from skimming the surface of the sea to the cloud with Icarus. This game is a high-speed mech shooting game capable of firing massive amounts of missiles.

name: Olaf the Boozer
description: Help a hungover dwarf piece together his wild night out! Olaf the Boozer is basically fantasy The Hangover as a sokoban game. You investigate the consequences of your epic pub crawl, fixing what can be fixed and making amends along the way. There’s a bit of mystery, one very angry chicken, and a nice time-bending twist on classic gameplay that keeps Olaf fresh.

Set in the lively 1970s, play as Hercule Poirot and detective Jane Royce as they solve two connected mysteries. Dive into a journey filled with intrigue, deception, and unexpected revelations.

name: Lonely Christmas
description:
Lonely Christmas is an indie horror walking simulator from the first person. Feel the festive atmosphere during the day and the scary atmosphere of loneliness at night.

Feel the Christmas atmosphere! The house is located in a beautiful place among a centuries-old forest. Kevin was left there alone as his parents had gone to the shop and left him a lot of tasks to prepare for the holiday.

In the evening, Kevin hears on the radio that a crazy robber has escaped from the convoy and that he may be near his house. You have to keep the robber out of the house, call the police and wait for your parents. Good luck.

description: Gift Collector is a New Year's horror game from the first person, in the Japanese style and genre of walking simulator. Collect gifts and make the kids happy on New Year's Eve. But don't forget that Midnight is a time of miracles!

The game has 3 characters that you can choose.... although with one of them you have to unlock a dialogue first before you can play it... haha
