name: Work In Progress
description:
It’s your first day in office, half of the staff is on burnout and the other half is already AFFLICTED.
Seems familiar ?... I know !
In Work In Progress, eliminate all that threatens the WAY, so you can once more perform your capitalist duties in peace !
An action Roguelite tainted with mysteries.

An impactful ACTION gameplay !

name: ESP: ExtraSensitive Pervert
description:
Blessed with powerful extrasensory abilities, a gross girl spends all day arguing with strangers on the internet about anime and eating junk food. Has she finally caught her lucky break when a beautiful girl she's never seen before comes knocking at her door? Find out how this easily excitable pervert handles this unusual development in her otherwise monotonous life.

An erotic kinetic visual novel, ~15k words in length.

name: Black Armor: Battle For Survivors
description:
In a world on the brink of chaos, Black Armor, Spicy, Charlie and other heroes fight to maintain balance, while the Grim Reaper and his dark forces threaten to destroy everything. Prepare for a story full of bravery, betrayal and redemption, where every fight counts.

Experience the most visceral and challenging combat. Don't miss it!

name: Archaeology: Sand Fantasy
description: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Janken Horn
description: Janken Horn is a "Rock Paper Scissors" card game. When a simple luck testing game suddenly becomes a strategy game, you will understand. Why does it make you think so much when all you need to do is to pick one from Rock/Paper/Scissors?

name: ODouzy!!!
description: In ODouzy!!!, guide a cute rectangle through colorful levels, dodging bomb traps and collecting beans and douzy. With a blend of simple movement mechanics and challenging puzzles, navigate vibrant worlds and gather enough the douzy to emerge victorious in this lighthearted, strategic adventure!

name: A Few Days With: Emma
description: Embark on a sensual Christmas Baubles hunting adventure with Emma, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Emma's enticing layers.

name: Flash Doll
description: Surprise blind boxes and custom outfits combined with physics-driven action figures, automatic battles, custom moves, and intense showdowns ready to start!

name: TattooVR
description: TattooVR is an immersive art experience that brings the ancient art of tattooing into the cutting edge of VR. TattooVR also supports VRM-format avatars, so you can upload your favorite characters and design one-of-a-kind tattoos just for them.

name: Summons Sword: Pot Guardian
description: "Summons Sword: Pot Guardian" is a top-down, highly challenging action game. Teleport to dodge enemy attacks, fight with swords and summoning magic, and recover the treasure "Clay Pot of Darkness" stolen by the evil summoner!

name: HuntNPrey
description: HuntNPrey is a multiplayer hide-and-seek game for up to 8 players. By day, act natural and blend in with the herd to escape the hunter's sights. By night, transform into a wolf and flip the script—now it's your turn to hunt! Stay sneaky, stay sated, or get caught!

name: Fallen: Into the Darkness
description: Dive deep into the darkness in this free-to-play, single-player platformer. Time moves fast, so keep your light alive and watch your step, each attempt reshapes the entire level.

name: Sweet X'mas
description: Sweet X'mas - is a simple and beautiful puzzle game with a Christmas theme. It is accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photos in the gallery.

name: Space Thugs
description: Space Thugs, join the space thugs as they got on an adventure across the universe. Includes strip clubs.

name: Saihate Station
description: An exploration/horror/adventure game about the codependent, love-hate relationship between two men.

name: Jigsaw Swimsuit
description: Jigsaw Puzzle with illustrations of pretty Gals! The most puzzles have more than 20 pieces. Can you assemble back?

name: Polysemy‌
description: This game has won the hearts of many players with its fresh and minimalist design.

name: 3Dash
description: 3Dash, a three-dimensional autoscrolling platformer. Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer!

name: Gravity Block 2
description: Gravity Block 2 is a minimalist puzzle game where the player must control the environment to make the Block reach the end.

name: Pop DS
description: Pop DS is a match 3 game with a twist, you POP (don't swap) gems to remove them. As you progress you will learn new moves and encounter lots of on grid interactive objects. Enjoy playing the game casually, or aim for a challenge worthy of a gamer and go for 100% completion!

name: Date Banger
description: Date Banger is an exhilarating 3D adult dating game where you meet stunning girls by swiping through videos. Engage in rhythm games and fun activities to charm and win over a variety of beautiful girls. Dive into a world of pleasure, unforgettable moments.

name: Military Defense
description: Protect the base from an alien invasion. Place cannons and destroy the invaders. Upgrade cannons to resist the enemies.

name: Big Blind
description: Where Sound Becomes Sight, Style Meets Violence. Step into the world of darkness as a blind protagonist who sees through sound in this stylish 2D top-down shooter where every kill matters and style is everything.

name: Promized Land: Outer Town
description: PL:OT 2025 is a third-person shooter horror survival simulator where you will experience terror while exploring an infected city, alone or with your closest person.

name: Castaway Hand
description: A relaxing vacation, a leisurely journey - that's how it was supposed to be, but due to a cruise ship crash, you are stranded on a tropical desert island. With its vast sandy beaches, dense woods, and possibly less dangerous animals - do you, by any chance, have what it takes to survive?

name: Wonderland X: Next Dream
description: Wonderland X：Next Dream is a 3D fantasy MMO client game. It is an immersive map created with great ingenuity. You can challenge countless rare and exotic beasts and create a world that belongs only to you. Dream.

name: Motorcycle Combat
description: The game is designed to drive a motorcycle and kill or destroy targets along city roads, occupying the Goal, allowing the game player to win. You need more than 100 points and 10 shields to win.

name: Gacha Addict Simulator
description: A simulator game where you play as a gacha-addicted human of society. Go to work, earn money, survive, and do what you were meant to do as a human being - play all the gacha games in the world. Gacha pulls earn you collectibles that you can place in and decorate the space of your small apartment!

name: My House
description: 3D Action Shooter, Tower Defence Game. Kill monsters. Buy items for defence. Save Your House.

name: Diner Simulator: Horror Story
description: Take on the role of a night shift worker at a small fast food kiosk, where mystery awaits. Your predecessor has vanished under eerie circumstances, and it's now your job to uncover the truth. As you juggle late-night orders, unsettling occurrences start to unravel.

name: Hideko
description:
Hideko is a short mystery game about nature.

Explore the rules of a small sandbox world to create new objects, plants and other forms of life! Discover special situations and interactions to earn stars to increase your inventory-size and unlock new areas.

name: Decline
description: This game transports players into a mysterious dark world, where they play as a red strawberry bear.

name: Criteria
description: This game plunges players into a cold and snowy world, where they take on the role of a black ghost, moving forward through the icy landscape.

name: Forgotten Memories
description: Forgotten Memories is an adult visual novel where your choices lead to intimate relationships and multiple outcomes. Uncover your lost memories, forge connections with three unique women, and experience both emotional and erotic storylines.

name: Imperium
description: A medieval fantasy, round-based horde mode FPS. Become a Paladin solo or with up to 3 friends, wield swords and spells to purge an endless onslaught of reanimated horrors. Perform rituals, unlock spells and melee weapons, and uncover the truth behind the enchanted fortress you are sworn to protect.

name: Furry Aim Trainer: Gooning Mode
description: Edge closer to victory with gooning mode! 20 unique furry targets as well as videos to practice with!

name: Twas The Night
description: Build and manage Santa's North Pole mega-workshop in this festive city builder where workshops produce toys for the world's children. Spend Christmas Spirit to create new holiday traditions and upgrade your workshops, but lose your spirit and you'll cease to exist.

name: Tank Arena: Total Operation
description: Tank Arena:Total Operation is a free MMO war game where you play as a commander, drive thousands of types of tanks, armored vehicles or helicopters on a massive battlefield engaging in 12v12 team-based battles against players globally. Enjoy the fun!

name: Countermark Saga: The Tale of Fariz
description: "Countermark Saga: The Tale of Fariz" is an SRPG set in the medieval world of Yusia. A modern high school student is mysteriously transported to this ancient land and caught in its conflicts. Alongside a princess, they embark on a dangerous journey filled with intrigue and hidden secrets.

name: The Battle for Christmas
description: The Battle for Christmas is a festive platformer where you play as Santa, battling goblins who stole Christmas presents. Explore 30 levels, face 3 epic bosses, and enjoy charming graphics in this fun adventure to save the holiday season!

name: War Rats: The Rat em Up
description: Be a rat. Kill the rats. Sidescrolling shooter meets tower defence with a sprinkle of RPG elements. A hand-drawn rat-filled side-scrolling looter-shooter moba-lite 2D gore-fest inspired by that brutal 90s gaming feel of yore.

name: Monoquous 2
description: A challenging puzzle platformer in which you can phase through walls to invert the world around you, taking the direction of gravity with it - up becomes down, black becomes white, and deadly obstacles lose and gain their threat along the way.

name: Combat Rally
description: Gear up for mayhem! Combat Rally combines real car physics with explosive battles. Outrace and outgun your friends on thrilling tracks using a deadly arsenal. With local and online multiplayer, it's the ultimate party game. Think fast, drive hard, and dominate the rally—your gears, your rules!

name: Coffee Break
description: It's time for a well-deserved break from your space-engineering stuff. Unravel the functioning of your freshly repaired coffee machine, while trying not to destroy the Earth. The fate of all humanity lies on your mug!

name: The Devil's Bride
description: Run from The Devil’s Bride, where you must outwit and escape from the clutch of the Devil’s Bride to save your niece, Nina. Solve challenging puzzles while hiding from the relentless Devil’s Bride in the world of Indonesian cult horror experience.

name: Utter a Name
description: Utter a Name is a challenging detective adventure with strong emphasis on atmosphere and investigation. The goal is to investigate a small manor and deduce the identities of several disembodied souls and their murderers.

name: Technically Frogs Can Fly
description: Hustle as a frog, catching bugs, mining, gambling, and more to dodge crushing child support debt!

name: Costume Curse
description: An Action-Command RPG where Halloween costumes become a reality

name: Monkeround
description: A fast-paced side-scrolling shooter about primates getting access to weaponry way above their paygrade.

name: Prison X: Chapter 1 - The Devil and The Sun
description: Heavy doors open and you're swept into the surreal world of Prison X, an infamous Bolivian jail in the Neo-Andean underworld. As you navigate amongst devils, saints, wicked characters, corrupt prison guards and even a Western filmmaker; hold onto your soul so La Diabla doesn't snatch it away.

name: Wyrmhall: Brush and Banter
description: Meet quirky characters and clean strange artifacts in this short cozy comedy game. From an enchanted teacup to a cursed skull with a chip on its shoulder, each item and client brings new twists and surprises.

name: Gun Reflex VR
description: Realistic VR shooter game where you try to complete all the floors by killing your enemies with limited ammunition. It also features zombie, shooting range, and weapon carnival modes.

name: House of Horror: Outside is Better
description: House of Horror: Outside is better" is a first-person psychological horror video game that offers an immersive and terrifying experience. With the help of your wits and strength, and a dynamo flashlight, explore the facilities of the house of horror, solve puzzles, and try to get out of it alive.

name: Invariant
description: As Nabla Station’s search for energy beneath the Antarctic ice spirals into chaos, a scientist must take on rogue AI, strange creatures, and deranged colleagues using inventive tools, powerful weapons, and quick thinking to uncover the station’s secrets and reclaim control.

name: GrimmKitchen
description: This game is an action simulation that allows players to enjoy two different genres: an "Action Part" where you gather ingredients in a fairy tale world, and a "Management Part" where you run a restaurant using the ingredients you've collected.

name: Moony: Black_Lotus
description: In a world of corrupted memories, you traverse the remains of a once flourishing city. Shadows flicker around you and metallic echoes pulse through your mind. Search for your father's legacy to regain your forgotten past. But beware! Each step takes you deeper into a waking nightmare.

name: Pixel Frenzy
description: Pixel Frenzy is a fast-paced first-person shooter game where you create your own combat style in fully destructible environments. Defeat the pixel monsters invading the real world. Grab your weapon and save the world by destroying everything in your path!

name: Just a Little Purr Suit
description: In Just a Little Purr_suit, use cards to guide the kitten along the path. Use cannons, trampolines, and even interdimensional portals to reach the bird as quickly as possible and scare it away.

name: Shadow Siege
description: Shadow Siege is an exhilarating third-person shooter (TPS) that plunges players into heart-pounding, action-packed battles. With fast-paced gameplay and strategic combat

name: 5 Nights at Timokha's 4 School
description: Continuation of the legendary saga about the naughty Timokha and his delicious pie!

name: Grand Mall Simulator
description: Manage and expand your own shopping mall in Grand Mall Simulator! Open diverse boutiques, stock shelves, decorate, and attract customers to grow your profits. Hire workers for automation and create a unique mall experience. Can you turn your center into a bustling mall?

name: Ad Astra: Sci-Fi Tower Defense
description: Lose yourself in an indie solo-dev. treasure that harkens back to arcade classics! All while thumping along to killer retro-inspired beats by Ovani sound. Embark on an epic tower defense adventure against awe-inspiring machine monstrosities, made by a devoted gamer for devoted gamers.

name: A Coloring Break
description: Fill the blank patterns with colors and take a coloring break on paper.

name: Hentai World Halloween
description: This is a captivating game featuring stunning and charming girls. Immerse yourself in the jigsaw puzzle mechanics, arranging pieces to reveal the full picture of these eye-catching characters.

name: Christmas Mutilator
description: Inspired by 80s slasher films, Christmas Mutilator is an immersive horror and home invasion game. Your husband and children are trapped in the storm, you are stuck in a cabin for the holidays. Use every tactic you can to stay alive and get out of your house as a vicious psychopath breaks in.

name: Penguin Escape
description: Penguin Escape is a fun and challenging game to play, simply collect all the items in order to move to the next phase, just do not get caught, use portals and platforms for your advantage

name: All About Maze
description: A casual, retro, Atari-inspired maze traversing game. Controllers recommended! Play by yourself or couch-coop with your friends and family.

name: Poop on Red
description: Take the wind! Avoid the buildings! Chasing the red car! Poop! Poop!

name: Guns, Blocks, and Steel
description: A voxel-based multiplayer FPS with fully destructible terrain and an emphasis on strategy, tactics, and resource management. Play singleplayer with bots or multiplayer PVP/co-op.

name: Atropos
description: "Atropos" is a visual novel in which you will learn about the story of Atropos, the prince of Capernaum.

name: Blocktopia
description: Blocktopia is a vibrant and humorous clicker city-builder game. Gather resources, build your town, and defend it against nightly raids! In this chaotic world where justice prevails, survive and dive into a fun city-building experience!

name: AnderKant 2
description: Get ready for AnderKant 2, with more dreamy visuals and great music to inspire your soul while you're pondering about your next project or journey. Prepare to explore 7 abstract environments with 7 tracks each carefully crafted for a unique vibe for each world.

name: CybArena
description: CybArena is a wave-based survival game set in a gritty cyberpunk dystopia. Battle endless waves of enemies, harness powerful perks and power-ups, and see how long you can endure. How far will you go?

name: Wakka Follow the Treasure Ring
description: The controls are really simple, so don't worry! To raise the spaceship, just press the button. When you release it, gravity will pull the spaceship down. Collect "wakka" while avoiding walls and obstacles.

name: Fisherman
description: click start fish

name: Clearing Blade

name: Word Rave
description: Word Rave is a fast-paced word game with a killer soundtrack. Form words quickly in thrilling "Rave" mode or chill out with increasing difficulty in "Chill" mode. Featuring a cute cat mascot, get ready to unleash your inner wordsmith!

name: Last Spirit PBT
description: Play solo or with up to 4 players in Last Spirit PBT, a fast-paced roguelike adventure. Crash-land on your former home, now an alien-infested world, and battle relentless machine foes. Combine loot to power up and master each character. Use sharp combat and smart strategy to conquer the chaos.

name: Autogiro
description: In Autogiro, a fast-paced, side-scrolling shooter, you take control of a sophisticated helicopter and set off on a mission where your survival depends on your accuracy, quick thinking, and strategy!

name: Benchmark Your Skills
description: With tests to measure and improve cognitive abilities such as memory, reflexes, and reaction time. Try it now and challenge your brain!

name: Eternal Night Glory

name: Eclipse Casino

name: Propa.
description: In this RTS game, control your virus to replicate and evolve against a powerful immune system. Equip gene segments to create unique viral armies. Use tactics to eliminate immune cells or achieve escape. Develop strategies for domination and enjoy endless strategic fun!

name: Zen Beauty
description: Beautiful women in swimsuits, a picturesque courtyard, and flashes of inspiration captured from the mind—this is an idle game that requires minimal operation. A wide variety of decorations and outfits can be purchased using points earned through idling.

name: Platform 4
description: The sequel to the acclaimed anomaly-finding games "Nibansen" and "Sanbansen" has finally arrived! Find the pattern and escape if an anomaly occurs in the mysterious homage-inspired escape game "Platform 4," where you journey from a repeating station to the airport.

name: Soulfall
description: Descend into Hell and reclaim your soul in this fast-paced Action RPG roguelike where your choices shape your destiny. Create your hero, pick your class, and fight your way through hordes of demons, slimes, and skeletons in a journey of vengeance and redemption.

name: Planeturem
description: Explore a procedurally generated planet filled with resources to harvest - or discover structures containing potentially rare items. Build your base to protect yourself and fight off evil, collecting materials to build new gear. Build a rocket and explore new planets!

name: Pew Pew Gaem 3
description: You owe the mafias some money... Fight trough the deadly waves of enemies and stay alive while trying to get to the person behind all this chaos.

name: Peek-A-Mimic Christmas Castle
description: The mimics are on the loose - and this time, it's Christmas! Explore the castle and solve its puzzles to reveal and capture all of the hidden mimics.

name: Pissed Off: Peeing Simulator
description: Another job simulator at the top of Steam, seriously? Piss on work and a bunch of dumbass simulators in this game!

name: Belote 3 in 1
description: Experience the ultimate Belote game with our feature-packed app that brings the classic French card game to life! Our digital version offers Belote, Coinche, and Contrée, all in one place - enjoy a wide range of customization options to tailor your gameplay experience.

name: Convict Team Tactics
description: Turn-based tactics. 20 dangerous convicts. Suicide missions.

description: Lost Islands - Legend Pack

name: Lost Islands: Pioneer Pack
description: Lost Islands - Pioneer Pack

name: Do the Cat
description: Stay a while and listen, chill out to calm ambient music, soft cat purring while collecting cute, awesome, and epic images for your collection!

name: Junkyard Rush Racing
description: Junkyard Rush Racing evokes the rugged charm of southern US style daredevil racing, inspired by the adventurous spirit of "Dukes of Hazzard."Race opponents, complete time trials and take on tournaments in single player - or challenge a friend for a cutthroat couch multiplayer session!

name: The Crossroads
description: Serve customers and guide their stories to their best, or worse, endings. Help resolve their conflicts with a chat and a drink!

name: Naoki
description: Naoki is an arcade platform game.help our hero to save his friends captured by a demon

name: Trait
description: Harness the power of the elements in an exhilarating 2D Metroidvania adventure! Traverse a plague-stricken kingdom, face deadly foes, and uncover the truth behind a devastating storm. With handcrafted environments and challenging combat, shape your destiny in a world teetering on the edge of ruin.

name: One Dog's Stay
description: A quiet story of a dog's days, woven in MS Paint-style graphics.

name: Recalcitrant
description: This game presents a fun and challenging adventure for players.

name: Alleviate
description: This game is a simple yet challenging casual game suitable for players of all ages.

name: Intransigent
description: This game welcomes every brave warrior to a deserted pirate island overrun by monsters.

name: LuckyWheel
description: 1.A casual deck-building game 2.Choose suitable characters to create your unique playstyle 3.Activate the spinning wheel at the right moment 4.Strategically optimize your spinning wheel setup to achieve various effects

name: Stan
description: Obsessive fans are common for artists, but this one is different. He's found his way to the home of J.W. Eel slug, a piano player who just got a deadline from a record label, and is determined to get inside.

name: The Tunnels
description: A simple top-down 2D video game with elements of mining, exploring and upgrading your vehicle.

name: How to Melt a Maiden's Heart
description: A cute, sweet boys love / yaoi visual novel about a high school student who discovers the formidable student council president is crossdressing on the sly and working at a maid café.

name: Trade Conquest
description: Rise from a cunning strategist to a powerful ruler. Master economic warfare, manipulate global events, and build industries or armies to conquer the world. Every decision in this modern Grand Strategy game shapes your ascent to power—will you rise through wealth or force?

name: Orifoldium
description: Fold your way through mindspinning puzzles

name: Leaving Whisper at Night
description: Leaving Whisper at Night is a free, exploration-based indie game that tells the story of the protagonist, Yuniga, and their experiences throughout the game.

name: SteamMaze
description: Open world, rich gameplay, picking up garbage, driving trains, traps, catching, cooking. Concepts and impacts such as food chain systems, weather, physical and chemical logic. All living beings have SAN values and intelligence. As a survival adventure game, it offers unlimited expansion content!

name: Buster Jam
description: Buster Jam is a comedic, fast-paced minigame frenzy full of wonderfully wacky characters. Its early 2000s style and soundtrack take full advantage of its rich story and hilarious visuals.

name: Dead, Too Dead
description: Dead, too dead is an open-world survival game where an ordinary person from the 21st century is summoned to a fantasy world on the brink of apocalypse. Use any means necessary to survive in this world. Just remember one thing: you are not a legend. You are just an ordinary person.

name: BDSM Fuel Station: Interactive Physics Simulation
description: This is a game that utilizes real physics simulation, where the protagonist interacts with props in the scene through a physics simulation engine. Therefore, every time you play, it offers you a different experience.

name: Break.Up
description: break.up is a block-breaking roguelite all about bouncing your ball as high as it can go.

name: Maize
description: Welcome to the Warren Family Haunted Halloween Corn Maze! Collect all of the harvest items to fill your cornucopia and unlock the exit of the maze! Have fun, and watch out for the scarecrows! Ha-ha! Just kidding! Our maze is completely safe and family friendly - we promise!

name: Game of Fate 2: A Century's Promise
description: Transported back a century by fate, you find yourself in a legendary tale of vengeance. Amidst powerful enemies in a tumultuous era, your mission is to assist those around you. Experience this immersive epic from a first-person perspective—authentic, weighty, yet brimming with hope.

name: The Nine Rebirths
description: This is a 2D platform decryption adventure game about a cat rescuing its owner. The underworld is full of organs and challenges, can you use the cat's connection between "soul" and "body" to complete this adventure full of dangers and difficulties? Download and play "Back to Life Nine Lives"!

name: Youxing Continent
description: Youxing Continent "is a fantasy style open world massively multiplayer online role-playing game, where the world economy is completely driven by players. It features a novel and interesting build equipment system, excellent social interaction, and exciting PVP and PVE.

name: Christmas Chaos
description: Christmas Chaos is a multiplayer party game perfect for the holiday spirit! Team up with friends and dive into 2 exciting modes. Get ready for holiday fun and laughter!

name: Aritas: The Demon Lord
description: Explore a world of magic and adventure in the world of Aritas and defeat the Demon Lord! Play alone in single player or with friends on LAN in this classic-inspired RPG!

name: Minimalist Sudoku
description: A customizable Sudoku game that allows you to enjoy the joy of solving puzzles alone, as well as the fun of collaborating with others.

name: Cavalry Charge
description: Cavalry Charge·Three Kingdoms is a game that combines the historical theme of the Three Kingdoms with strategic elements. The game features a connected large-scale map design, supporting national wars with up to ten thousand players on the same map.

name: Melee Spaceship
description: Melee Spaceship is a top-down shooter roguelite where you control a spaceship with...no guns?! To survive the invasion you must smash enemies while dodging danger to earn cash and unlock new powers and abilities for a variety of unique builds.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legend - Element Bike Pack
description: It's time to get goofy on our tiny Pit Bikes!

name: MX vs. ATV: Legend - Reflex Pack
description: Compete on 6 fan favourite events from MX vs ATV Reflex!

name: MX vs. ATV: Legend - Triumph Pack 2024
description: Start your engines! Purchase the Triumph Pack and experience real off-road riding!

name: MX vs. ATV: Legend - Lawrence Dog Pound Pack
description: Ride like a champion on three brand-new tracks at the official Lawrence Dog Pound compound!

name: Graduation Life Simulator
description: Graduation Life Simulator "is a simple and casual 2D simulation business development game. Here, you will transform into a newly graduated college student, bringing dreams and challenges to the big city, striving to accumulate wealth from scratch, with the ultimate goal of earning 10 million yuan!

name: Zoomer Simulator
description: Explore unorthodox locations and meet avant-garde characters (in no way inspired by real-life personalities or events) in an indie RPG written like a road movie if a road movie was written like an indie RPG (it's not like a road movie).

name: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator
description: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator is a 2D game with a lot of mechanics. It is always exhausting to look for apartment, but fortune is at your side now! Welcome your new roommate, Yoshima! Can you find the key to her heart? Don't forget to pay the rent!

name: Workaholic Simulator: Leaving the Dream
description: Workaholic Simulator is a first person immersive psychological horror game. It's a short, disturbing and surreal experience about working in our contemporary world.

name: Vterm ATC Simulator
description: vTERM: Your ultimate ATC radar simulator! Command a fictional airport with a 27/09 runway layout. Navigate realistic scenarios with precision using the STARS scope interface.

name: Waifu Simulator
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Lost Pages: Classic
description: In this roguelike deck-building game, uncover ancient secrets in dark mist. Build your deck with magic circles and artifacts, battle monsters, and plan routes on a shifting map. Face the 100 levels of the dimensional gate. Grow and take on new challenges as you progress.

name: Waifu Simulator: Christmas Edition
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Waifu Simulator: Horem Edition
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Waifu Simulator: Latex Edition
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Water Game Simulator
description: A classic casual puzzle game that simulates a water ring machine.

name: Waifu Simulator: Beach Edition
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Waifu Simulator: Furry Edition
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Wheelchair Simulator
description: Wheelchair Life Sim where mastering control and speed is key to overcoming outrageous obstacles! Even the simplest movements can be your greatest challenge.

name: Weed Lord Simulator
description: Grow, trim, and sell your way to becoming the ultimate cannabis kingpin. Expand your empire, hire dealers, and dominate the underground market!

name: Weed Simulator
description: Don't smoke weed. Become weed!

name: Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws
description: Survive in a wild world as nature's strongest hunter with Wolf Simulator: Silent Paws! Explore, survive and write your own legend! Join this epic adventure now and become the true hero of the forest.

name: Wood Shop Simulator
description: Chop trees, craft amazing wood pieces, and grow your workshop! Whether you're playing it safe in the woods or risking it all in the city, your skills and reputation will shape your success. Upgrade your tools, hire a team, and auction your creations to become the top woodworker around!

name: Trash Buster Simulator
description: Join the adventure of cleaning the world! Clean dirty beaches, parks, and cities. Broadcast on social media to raise donations and grow your team. Lead a global environmental movement. Change the world with every cleanup!

name: VR Store Simulator
description: Step into a dynamic VR supermarket! Manage your store, stock shelves, cater to customers, and create the ultimate shopping destination . Perfect for fun and learning, this immersive simulation lets you strategize and thrive in supermarket management. Ready to start?

name: Unemployment Simulator
description: Navigate the challenges of life without a job in Unemployment Simulator, a first-person survival experience where you manage your day-to-day needs, search for work, and try to stay afloat. Balance basic needs like food, hygiene, and sanity while facing the harsh realities of unemployment.

name: Unemployment Simulator 2018
description: A social welfare survival horror based on real events. Endure emotional pain, crushing pressure of adulthood and societal expectations while evading a literal death by boredom. Battle demons, hide from skeletons, keep your bathroom clean. Uncover a dark mystery and emerge as a hero.

name: Unwanted Xmas Gift Burning Simulator
description: Under Santa's watchful eye, burn wood logs, wrapped gifts, or a random mix from the elves' workshop. Enjoy the mesmerizing fire as your pile of gifts turns to ashes. Just sit back, relax, and let the magic of the flames warm you. Happy burning!

name: Vacation Cafe Simulator
description: Cozy Italian Vacation Cafe ️ No timers, No stress cook traditional dishes upgrade and customize just drink prosecco, relax and grow your dream cafe

name: Van Simulator
description: Van Simulator is a delivery game where you drive a van, pick up packages, and deliver them. Expand your business, upgrade your van, and manage deliveries efficiently. Enjoy urban delivery in a low-poly environment.

name: Virtual Girl: Sex Simulator VR
description: Customize every moment with over 200 body animations and 100 facial expressions. With realistic HDRP graphics and full VR support, dive into a world of passion and connection like never before. Whether on PC or in Virtual Reality, this is your chance to create your perfect experience.

name: Thrift Store Simulator
description: Thrift Store Simulator, you own and operate a second-hand store in a bustling city. Customers will bring a variety of items to your shop, and it’s your job to negotiate the best prices. With over 150+ unique items, each with its own bargaining value, every negotiation is a new challenge.

name: Title Screen Simulator
description: A title screen turned into a game! Yes you read it correctly, probably...

name: Top Burger Shop Simulator
description: In Top Burger Shop, whip up delicious burgers to satisfy hungry customers in a vibrant, fast-paced environment! Manage your shop, unlock new ingredients, and navigate fun challenges across 180 levels. Are you ready to delight your patrons?

name: Touch Grass VR Simulator
description: Touch Grass VR Simulator is a VR experience where you can relax in a virtual environment and touch grass, without actually going outside!

name: Toy Shop Simulator
description: Run your own toy store! Arrange shelves, set prices, process payments, and manage staff. Expand and design your shop, handle online orders, deliver with a scooter, trade rare toys, and ensure security. Create a magical shopping experience in Toy Shop Simulator!

name: Supermarket Simulator Pro
description: Run your own supermarket! Buy, stock, and sell items, expand your store, and manage customers. Customize your layout, explore new locations, and hire staff. Keep things fresh with variety and new challenges as you grow your business.

name: Super Alien Sniper: Super Realisitic Simulator
description: A SUPER REALISTIC (ahem..) alien sniper simulator! Use your super quick reaction skills to outwit the alien blighters and snipe your way to victory!

name: Supermarket Surviving Simulator
description: Want to relax after a tough day? Probably not going to happen. In this hardcore and immersive simulator, you’ll experience all the pain of managing your own store. Start with just one dollar in your account and bankrupt your competitors.

name: Tattoo Removal Simulator
description: Take on the role of a skilled tattoo removal specialist. Enjoy a soothing pace that lets you focus on the calming process of tattoo removal. Set in a small studio in a bustling city, your all clients share one goal: erasing parts of their past, marked by colorful images, texts, secrets and stories.

name: Tattoo Studio Simulator
description: Become a great tattoo artist and work your way to success! Have you always wanted to learn how to draw tattoos? Now you can do it in our tattoo studio simulator.

name: Tea House Simulator
description: Offer a warm tea experience while keeping up with the dynamic flow of the city. Step out of being an ordinary business owner and get ready for a simulation where you set the rhythm of the city!

name: Tech Market Simulator
description: Build and manage your own tech store! Sell products like keyboards, mice, and gaming chairs. Hire employees, grow your shop, and make it the best place for gamers to shop. Can you become the top tech store?

name: TechStop Simulator
description: Prepare for an immersive retro arcade & game shop management experience. Take control of your very own TechStop! Stock your shelves with games and arcade classics, set prices, manage payments, hire staff, expand & design your store to attract more customers. Stay ahead in competitive local market!

name: The Tavern Tales: Medieval Simulator
description: The Tavern Tales is a first-person medieval simulator! Start with an inherited tavern and turn it into a thriving business. Serve customers acquire titles, upgrade your tavern, and expand your holdings. Explore opportunities, open new businesses, engage in politics, and interact with town residents.

name: Soccer Pro Simulator
description: Soccer Pro Simulator is a realistic football (soccer) simulation designed to make you feel like a rockstar, making the crowd roar after scoring amazing goals. From powerful midfield shots to spectacular bicycle kicks, experience the thrill of becoming a true legend!

name: Skoof Simulator
description: Are you Skoof?

name: Small Santa Simulator
description: Put items back in their places in a winter wonderland as you try to beat your fastest time. Small Santa Simulator is a 2D platformer where you collect holiday themed items and put them back where they belong. Christmas is soon and everything must be ready for the big day, will you save Christmas?

name: Slavic Winter Simulator
description: Slavic Winter Simulator is an authentic experience that recreates the celebration of New Year among residents of the post-Soviet space in the 2000s, offering nostalgic emotions. Throw snowballs at your in-game friends, enjoy the magical atmosphere of New Year from the 2000s, and relive the carefree days of childhood.

name: Snow Resort Simulator
description: Step into the world of Snow Resort Simulator. Tackle daily responsibilities: upgrade facilities, maintain a cozy resort, satisfy guests with freshly cooked meals and drinks, and keep your inventory fully stocked. Be prepared for the challenges that come with winter.

name: Spaceflight Simulator 2
description: Build rockets and fly them around the Solar System in this realistic aerospace sandbox. Attempt landings, build space stations, drive rovers, perform spacewalks, explore alien worlds, and get your crew home safe.

name: Speedboat Simulator
description: Speedboat Simulator is a realistic speedboat racing game where you pilot high-speed boats, customize their colors, and compete in thrilling races. Navigate through Hawaiian waters, and make a splash when you reach the finish line!

name: Storefront Simulator
description: Build your retail empire! Tired of playing by someone else's rules? Design, build, stock, and manage your own retail paradise, from a humble corner shop to a sprawling commercial enterprise. Create a unique shopping experience and become a retail legend. Your customers are waiting!

name: Store Wars: Multiplayer Shop Simulator
description: Play solo or with up to 16 friends in a chaotic grocery store showdown! Manage, grow, and compete against rival stores in a fun, lighthearted battle of wits and strategy. Who will be the ultimate grocery tycoon? Sabotage, upgrade, and outwit your friends in this unpredictable simulator!

name: Streamer Manager Simulator
description: Living in the same apartment with an aspiring streamer... What could possibly go wrong?

name: Street Food Simulator
description: Welcome to the bustling world of street food! Grill hot dogs, sizzle hamburgers, and serve delicious snacks to hungry customers. Find best spot in the city, perfect your recipes, manage your stand and watch your reputation grow!

name: Sex Club Simulator
description: SEX CLUB Simulator is a wild adult clicker game where you step into the shoes of a strip club manager on a mission to make the hottest spot in town.

name: Shooting Range Owner Simulator
description: Run and develop your own Shooting Range and reach more and happy customers!

name: Shop Manager Simulator
description: Take charge of your own retail outlet. Stack shelves with products, hire staff, set prices, appease the customers, manage suppliers, expand your space. Grow from a little store into a massive supermarket.

name: ShoppingMall: Manager Simulator
description: Build your dream shopping empire from the ground up! Design, decorate, and attract top tenants. Keep customers thrilled, maximize profits, and dominate the industry. Can you become the ultimate shopping center tycoon? Start now and watch your empire thrive!

name: Shop Simulator
description: DESIGN, SELL & EXPAND – YOUR SUCCESS IS IN YOUR HANDS. Put your entrepreneurial skills to the test in Shop Simulator: Supermarket. Immerse yourself in the world of retail and start your own business today!

name: Shop Simulator: Pet Shop
description: In SHOP SIMULATOR: PET SHOP you can fulfill your dream of running a pet store. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of retail and keep your customers happy. You and up to three friends can customize your store and take care of all the needs of a pet store.

name: Simulator Countries
description: This game is a global strategy game that gives you the opportunity to play for countries in the modern world. Here you will be given a choice of 198 countries for which you can play.

name: Redhawk Simulator
description: REDHAWK Simulator is a laid-back flying simulator arcade game where players soar through four unique environments, collecting fruits and plants along the way to fuel their expedition. Score points by collecting as many as you can!

name: Resort Hotel Simulator
description: Hotel Owner Simulator is a hotel management game where you start from a small hotel and grow your business by creating beautifully designed rooms, adjusting room sizes and layouts by placing each individual wall, negotiating high prices, and expanding your empire. Lets build, and manage the resort.

name: Rental Store Simulator
description: Run your own movie store. Choose your movies, customize your store, hire employees and build your movie empire!

name: Ride Hailing Simulator
description: Come and experience the feeling of a ride hailing driver, listening to orders, running orders, and charging new energy vehicles! Complete the task list, look at the speedometer, listen to music, and enjoy leisure time!

name: RKN Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: ROAM: Wild Horse Simulator
description: ROAM is a silly sandbox game where you play as a wild horse! Customize your horse and five members of your herd and explore the open world! Reunite and take care of your herd! Breed your horses to welcome new foals! Choose to cause havoc in the local towns! However you play, roam free!

name: Robot Fury: Mech Combat Simulator
description: Robot Fury is a mech combat simulator where you can feel like a true robot warrior. Fight enemies with a powerful flamethrower, soar into battle with your jetpack, and finish off foes with precise machine gun headshots. Customize your mech and engage in exhilarating, epic battles!

name: Rocket Simulator
description: Travel with your spacecraft throughout the solar system based on realistic Kepler's laws of gravity. Invent your own routes between planets, use gravity, explore space, trade, upgrade your spaceship and enjoy the beautiful scenery!

name: Roots and Recipes: Farm and Restaurant Simulator
description: Grow crops, cook meals, and manage your restaurant in a colorful low-poly world! Balance farming and cooking, expand your farm, and delight customers with fresh, delicious dishes.

name: Schoolteacher Simulator
description: Become a teacher in a local school. Teach kids, but make sure that your students stay focused during the lesson and react if they misbehave. Each day has unique events. Living school environment with each teacher and student having their own personality.

name: Sea Town: Fish Market Simulator
description: Build your fishing empire in Sea Town - Fish Market Simulator! Explore oceans, upgrade boats, and conquer a dynamic market across unique islands. Ready to rule the seas? Start now!

name: Politburo Simulator
description: Politburo Simulator is a turn-based strategy game where you take on the role of the General Secretary in a fictional Communist country. Manage your Politburo, make critical decisions, and navigate a web of political events to maintain control over the nation and defend the Revolution.

name: In Memoriam
description: Sin descripción

name: Post Office Simulator
description: You are the new postal worker! Serve customers by sending and receiving packages and letters. Check the contents of boxes for prohibited items. Every decision you make has consequences. Decide whose side you're on.

name: Potion Shopkeeper Simulator
description: Potion Shopkeeper is a cozy 3D game where you run a potion shop, craft potions, set prices, and manage customer reactions. Unlock rare ingredients, experiment with recipes, and manage your reputation to attract more customers and grow your shop!

name: Quadrober Simulator
description: Are you a quadrober?

name: Randomly Jerk Simulator
description: "Randomly Jerk Simulator" is a roguelite simulation game that uses a slot machine to simulate the parasitic behavior of a jerk who relies on his parents. This game does not contain any gambling behavior or cash transactions.

name: Real Pharmacy Simulator
description: Become the owner of a pharmacy in Real Pharmacy Simulator! Manage the business, serve customers, and balance profit with ethics. Order medicines, organize the space, and decide how to run your business - honestly or riskily. Your decisions will determine the fate of the pharmacy!

name: Recycle Factory Simulator
description: Buy junk, recycle and sell! Unlock new machines, produce products and upgrade your factory! "Recycle Factory Simulator" is a first-person simulator game where you work in your own recycle factory.

name: Parking Attendant Simulator
description: Inherit a run-down parking lot from a relative and turn it into a mass-transit hub for all classes of people. Extend and upgrade services to attract new customers and keep their precious vehicles safe.

name: Parisian Brasserie Simulator
description: Manage your own brasserie in Paris and turn it into the place to be! Create menus, serve customers, and master every detail to grow your restaurant. Manage supplies, ensure top-notch service, and make your mark on the city of lights. Will you become the next Parisian brasserie institution?

name: Pirate Cove Simulator
description: Pirate Cove Simulator will have you run a shop and tavern on the Island of the Damned, to get rich and buy your way out of the pirate afterlife. Trade with restless undead pirates, run your own distillery and turn local plants into potent drinks, search for hidden treasures, or just go fishing.

name: Pizza Simulator Together
description: Pizza Simulator is a cooperative simulator where you manage a pizzeria, set up the kitchen, hire staff, prepare and deliver orders, and maintain the reputation and cleanliness of your establishment. Create your dream pizzeria!

name: PockeDate!: Pocket Dating Simulator
description: Your Pocket-Sized Dating Simulator! Every launch brings a new date with unique dialogues! Spend endless hours with your adorable, love-struck virtual girlfriend.
